mapper.select: SELECT CDNO ,CDLVL ,UPCD ,LPAD(' ', 5*(RN-1)) || CDNAME CDNAME ,USEYN FROM ( SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY CDLVL) RN ,CODEMNG.* FROM CODEMNG ) START WITH UPCD='C0000' CONNECT BY PRIOR CDNO = UPCD ORDER SIBLINGS BY UPCD
mapper.update: UPDATE CODEMNG SET CDLVL = #{cdlvl}, UPCD = #{upcd}, CDNAME = #{cdname}, INSUSER = '관리자', INSDATE = SYSDATE, USEYN = #{useyn} WHERE CDNO = #{cdno}
